task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
task_list.notes: Problem understood: SkyCoord.__getattr__ gives misleading error messages for subclass properties

task_list.title: Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests
task_list.notes: Environment has build issues, but we can work directly with the source code

task_list.title: Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files
task_list.notes: Found the issue in sky_coordinate.py lines 898-900 in __getattr__ method

task_list.title: Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue
task_list.notes: Successfully reproduced the issue - __getattr__ is called twice, masking the real error

task_list.title: Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution
task_list.notes: Found that checking for properties and calling super().__getattribute__ works

task_list.title: Phase 6: Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Successfully implemented fix in sky_coordinate.py lines 897-906

task_list.title: Phase 7: Verify the implementation
task_list.notes: Comprehensive testing shows fix works for all edge cases

task_list.title: Phase 8: Final review and testing
task_list.notes: Created comprehensive tests, verified fix works correctly, documented solution

function.arguments: {"security_risk": "LOW", "command": "plan", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: Read and understand the problem", "status": "done", "notes": "Problem understood: SkyCoord.__getattr__ gives misleading error messages for subclass properties"}, {"title": "Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests", "status": "done", "notes": "Environment has build issues, but we can work directly with the source code"}, {"title": "Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files", "status": "done", "notes": "Found the issue in sky_coordinate.py lines 898-900 in __getattr__ method"}, {"title": "Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue", "status": "done", "notes": "Successfully reproduced the issue - __getattr__ is called twice, masking the real error"}, {"title": "Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution", "status": "done", "notes": "Found that checking for properties and calling super().__getattribute__ works"}, {"title": "Phase 6: Implement the fix", "status": "done", "notes": "Successfully implemented fix in sky_coordinate.py lines 897-906"}, {"title": "Phase 7: Verify the implementation", "status": "done", "notes": "Comprehensive testing shows fix works for all edge cases"}, {"title": "Phase 8: Final review and testing", "status": "done", "notes": "Created comprehensive tests, verified fix works correctly, documented solution"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
